tourBios.jndTourYr: Earned NEC Series - PGA TOUR Latinoamérica card with seventh-place finish on the 2012 TLA
tourBios.carHigh: With seven Tour de las Americas (TLA) victories, he is known as “Estrellita,” or “Little Star” in his home country of Colombia for his small size and decorated career. 2010: Won the Dominican Republic Open. 2007: Won the Venezuela Open. 2002: Won three of his seven TLA titles in three consecutive weeks for a record setting performance in November. Shares second place on the TLA career victories list with Argentina's Ángel Cabrera and Andrés Romero. Career wins include the Colombia Open (1993, 2004 and 2005) and he has also represented Colombia seven times at the World Cup. Turned pro following his days as a caddie

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 8th on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri 2 times.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 66th in Career Money Leaders on the Latinoamérica.
